name: Who Let The Loons Out?
description:
Use Click "WASD" to move the Ball around, and Press "SPACE" to kill the loons by make them fall from the ring. Waring! Don't fall yourself from the ring, that is how you kill the Ball. You can use the Mouse to move around the camera and scroll to Zoom In and Zoom Out.

Please Read!

Thanks for Stoping by. One thing we want to say "Who Let The Loons Out?" is strictly a prototype stage, the game is nowhere completed, you will get a glimpse of how the gameplay would be of "Who Let The Loons Out?". We tried many different approaches to bring some uniqueness to the table for "BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2021.2". Hope you guys would enjoy the game as much as we had while making it.
